p: The L74I mutation appears to be a key characteristic of sub-subtype A6. To investigate the origin of the mutation in this genetic variant, we performed phylogenetic analyses using A6 ( n = 723), A ( n = 56), A1 ( n = 319), A2 ( n = 7), A3 ( n = 9), and A4 ( n = 3) sequences from different geographic regions.
